item.title: Wanted: TDD evangelist to speak at lunchtime talk (London) for a ...
item.description: So when it comes to using TDD there's a bit of a mixture - some people love TDD and use it all the time, some people have never got into it and instead write the unit tests after the code. As a result of some discussion between TDD fans about ...
